title: ClimaFi Smart HVAC System
description: Embedded C++ code, plus designed the second version of the HPC. used Wifi and custom IO Control libraries, and mesh network, and posting and reading data from Cloud Firestore using the FirebaseClient library. lvgl / TFT_eSPI for the captive touchscreen

title: ClimaFi App
description: Developed a complex mobile application using Flutter that integrates directly with the Firestore Database and streams live data to the user

title: Reflow Oven Controller
description: In a team of four, designed and implemented a reflow oven. Used C++ for a multi-threaded firmware to program a Xinc2 microcontroller, using SPI protocols and a PID controller. Sensed and displayed the temperature, humidity, and progress of reflow curve on an OLED.

title: MoneyMinder
description: Budget and expense tracking app, using an Express.js backend connected to a MySQL server, RESTful APIs Gemini AI and Unsplash, and a responsive React.js frontend. Designed and developed in 10 days.

title: Custom Macropad
description: Designed a PCB for a custom macropad, complete with two rotary encoders, an OLED, and 16 keys.
